name: Untitled Shooter Game (John Andrews)
description:
In my free time I've been developing a platformer shooter (since 20/06/2017 ) and it's gotten me interested enough to actually make something playable of it and even releasing a demo on the WIP post launch (13/07/2017), I'd like to hear your opinions on it and leave feedback, comment what you liked/disliked, review, etc.

As of now it is pretty much the base/engine of what the game is going to be, so leave feedback based on gameplay or bugs.
